import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Save, User, Shield, Bell, Palette, Database } from 'lucide-react'; const Settings = () => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ username: 'User', email: '', notifications: true, darkMode: false, saveConversations: true, dataPrivacy: true, language: 'en', theme: 'teal' }); const [isSaving, setIsSaving] = useState(false); const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; const handleSave = async () => { setIsSaving(true); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { setIsSaving(false); alert('Settings saved successfully!'); }, 1000); }; const SettingCard = ({ title, description, icon, children }) => (
{icon}

{title}

{description}

{children}
); return (
